text: Egha kɨ enselɨn mam barazima a mɨgeima enselɨn igharazir mam kamaghɨn an azai, “Bizir kurar e irebamɨn garir kaba, da dazoghɨn gɨvagham? Gumazamiziba dazoghɨn ua Godɨn ofa damuam. God bar aghuazir bizim an Dɨpenimɨn iti, kamaghɨn a uan Dɨpenim ataki, eghtɨ dughiar manamɨn arazir kurar kam gɨvagham? Eghtɨ dughiar manamɨn komɨn kamɨn gavgavim gɨvagham? Eghtɨ a ua Godɨn Dɨpenim gasɨghasɨghan koghɨva, Godɨn Nguibamɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba uan suemningɨn me dɨkabɨnan kogham?”
